name: 3i Infocom
description:
Hi,
3i Infocom here.
Since 2010, our company has aimed at delivering tech-marketing services to corporate clients achieved many major milestones. The company has worked for UK’s largest eCommerce retailers and many giant market leaders as well.
3i InfoCom is your one-stop destination if you are looking for the highly talented group of design, development and marketing professionals. The company follows the UK’s business standards and comprehensive work methodology. 3i InfoCom has a state of the art development infrastructure in India and also have representatives in the United Kingdom who will meet you and communicate with you.
Our great services.
-PHP &.NET Development
-Web Design & Development
-Mobile Apps Development
-Digital Marketing
-Brand Identity
And much more.
Thanks,
CB
READ MORE...
